text: @realDonaldTrump So do American Covid-19 deaths. Newsflash: Most of us care more about lives than your stupid stock market. Also, not everyone has money in the stock market. Some people just struggle to get by paycheck to paycheck, and aren't getting paychecks anymore. Grow some empathy.
